Data Fields
EMAC_IOCTL_PORT_PRIO_MAP_S Struct Reference

Port Priority configuration structure. More...

#include <emac_ioctl.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t portPrioMap [EMAC_IOCTL_PRIO_MAX]
 

Detailed Description

Port Priority configuration structure.

This arrary is used to map differnt PCP values (0-7) to 1 of 8 host/port queues.

Field Documentation

uint8_t EMAC_IOCTL_PORT_PRIO_MAP_S::portPrioMap[EMAC_IOCTL_PRIO_MAX]

Specifies mapping of 8 different PCP to 8 port queues/flow, eg portPrioMap[2] = 5 implies that any packet received with pcp value of 2 will be placed in port queue/flow 5.
